desc: Prince of Peace is an importer and distributor of over 40 renown brands from all around the world and is also known for its famous Ginger Honey Crystals and American Ginseng products. Certified by the Ginseng Board of Wisconsin, Prince of Peace is also the number 1 selling brand of American Ginseng products in the US.

layout.text: Want Your Ginseng Order Shipped Directly to China?
Shop at our JD Mall, and we will ship your order directly to your address in China. Worry-free. Hassle-free.
